trans-unit.source: Defines the relationship between a data item and the menu item it is binding to in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 定义数据项和它所绑定到中的菜单项之间的关系<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source where each data item contains multiple fields (such as an XML element with several attributes), if no menu item bindings are defined, a menu item displays the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item by default.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到其中的每个数据项包含多个字段的数据源 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素），如果未不定义任何菜单项绑定，菜单项显示返回的值`ToString()`方法默认情况下的数据项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the menu item displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the menu, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 对于 XML 元素，该菜单项显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的菜单上，否则不是非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can bind the properties of a menu item to a specific field by specifying menu item bindings.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定菜单项绑定，可以将菜单项的属性绑定到特定的字段。

trans-unit.source: A MenuItemBinding object defines the relationship between each data item and the menu item it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: MenuItemBinding 对象用于定义每个数据项和它所绑定到的菜单项之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control, menu item bindings have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控件，菜单项绑定不起任何作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Binding is performed automatically using the site map provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用站点地图提供商提供自动执行绑定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control stores its MenuItemBinding objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> property and applies the bindings to the data source to create a one-to-one relationship between the menu hierarchy and the data source hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制其 MenuItemBinding 将对象存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>属性并将绑定应用于要创建菜单层次结构和数据源层次结构之间的一对一关系的数据源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: For each data item in the data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control attempts to match the data item to a MenuItemBinding object to create the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 为数据源中的每个数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件尝试匹配到 MenuItemBinding 对象以创建相应的数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: When creating a MenuItemBinding object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 创建 MenuItemBinding 对象时，你必须指定绑定的条件。

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 该条件指示何时数据项应绑定到的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>, or both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>，和/或文件名。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A menu item depth specifies the menu level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 菜单项深度指定获取绑定的菜单级别。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following MenuItemBinding declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all nodes with a depth of 0: ``` <asp:MenuItemBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下 MenuItemBinding 声明将绑定到数据源的名称和 ID 字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性，分别的所有节点的深度为 0:``` <asp:MenuItemBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ```数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> object) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>对象) 公开<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A>属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: When a data source contains multiple data item types, the data member specifies which data item type to use.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员时数据源包含多个数据项目类型，指定的数据项目类型使用。

trans-unit.source: The following MenuItemBinding declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the menu items in the menu, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` <asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 MenuItemBinding 声明将绑定`<Book>`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>的菜单中，而不考虑位置层次结构中的所有菜单项的控件︰``` <asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ```有时可能需要创建一个指定的深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value.
trans-unit.target: 仅当数据源包含在具有相同的数据成员值的不同级别的项目时，经常使用这种。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have `<Item>` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以`<Item>`出现在 XML 文件中的不同级别的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following MenuItemBinding declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths: `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="1" TextField="Title">` `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="2" TextField="ISBN">` If a menu item binding is defined without a depth and a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu.
trans-unit.target: 下面的 MenuItemBinding 声明说明了如何指定应用于相同的数据成员位于不同的菜单深度的菜单项绑定︰ `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="1" TextField="Title">` `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="2" TextField="ISBN">`深度和数据成员未定义菜单项绑定，如果菜单项绑定应用于菜单中的所有菜单项。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth.
trans-unit.target: 这常用当所有数据项目具有相同的属性，并且应相同，显示无论菜单深度。

trans-unit.source: After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 建立绑定条件后，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>可以绑定到一个值的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects to which the MenuItemBinding object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>MenuItemBinding 对象应用到的对象共享相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Properties bound to fields contain the values of the corresponding field from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到字段的属性包含相应数据源的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can selectively override a bound property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object by setting the corresponding property directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以选择性地重写中的绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>通过直接设置对应的属性的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties of the MenuItemBinding class that allow you to bind a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field of a data item.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出 MenuItemBinding 类，可用于绑定的属性的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>数据项的字段的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>|The field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>|The field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.TextField%2A>|The field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ToolTipField%2A>|The field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ToolTip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>|The field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.| The following table lists the properties of the MenuItemBinding class that allow you to bind a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a static value.

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBinding object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: 定义并匹配深度和数据成员 MenuItemBinding 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBinding object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: 定义并匹配数据成员仅 MenuItemBinding 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBinding object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: 定义并匹配深度仅 MenuItemBinding 对象。

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBinding object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: 定义深度和数据成员都不 MenuItemBinding 对象。

trans-unit.source: (This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.) 5.
trans-unit.target: （此类型的菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。） 5.

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBinding object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在数据源中没有匹配项 MenuItemBinding 对象。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties of the menu items to which the MenuItemBinding object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项方法然后绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>MenuItemBinding 对象应用到项的菜单的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemBinding class also allows you to format the text displayed in a menu item by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: MenuItemBinding 类还可以通过设置显示在菜单项的文本格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.FormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>的新实例

trans-unit.source: It is often used when dynamically populating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 它通常用于动态填充时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data member to bind to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到的菜单项的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 该条件指示何时数据项应绑定到的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the DataMember property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性和 / 或 DataMember 属性中，。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the data source contains multiple elements or tables, use the DataMember property to specify the element or table to bind to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 当数据源包含多个元素或多个表时，DataMember 属性用于指定该表要绑定到的菜单项的元素。

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。

trans-unit.source: Each data item in a hierarchical data source (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName> object) exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which specifies the type of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 层次结构数据源中的每个数据项 (由表示<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>对象) 公开<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性，用于指定数据项目的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.Type%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declaration binds the `<Book>` elements of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control to all the menu items in the menu, regardless of the location in the hierarchy: ``` <asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ``` Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>声明绑定`<Book>`元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>的菜单中，而不考虑位置层次结构中的所有菜单项的控件︰``` <asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Book" TextField="Title" ValueField= "ISBN"> ```有时可能需要创建一个指定的深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: This is often used when the data source contains items at different levels that have the same data member value.
trans-unit.target: 仅当数据源包含在具有相同的数据成员值的不同级别的项目时，经常使用这种。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have `<Item>` elements that appear at different levels within an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以`<Item>`出现在 XML 文件中的不同级别的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declarations show how to specify menu item bindings that apply to identical data members at different menu depths: `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="1" TextField="Title">` `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="2" TextField="ISBN">` If a menu item binding is defined without a depth or a data member, the menu item binding is applied to all menu items within the menu.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>的声明显示了如何指定应用于相同的数据成员位于不同的菜单深度的菜单项绑定︰ `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="1" TextField="Title">` `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="2" TextField="ISBN">`深度或数据成员未定义菜单项绑定，如果菜单项绑定应用于菜单中的所有菜单项。 </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used when all data items have the same properties and should be displayed identically, regardless of the menu depth.
trans-unit.target: 这常用当所有数据项目具有相同的属性，并且应相同，显示无论菜单深度。

trans-unit.source: After the binding criteria are established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 建立绑定条件后，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>可以绑定到一个值的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can bind to a field of a data item or to a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到数据项目的字段或为静态值。

trans-unit.source: When bound to a static value, all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied share the same value.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到静态值，所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象共享相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Properties bound to fields contain the values of the field from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 绑定到字段的属性包含的数据源的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: If conflicting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> objects are defined, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control applies the menu item bindings in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果冲突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义对象，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件适用以下优先顺序中的菜单项绑定︰ 1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配深度和数据成员的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches the data member only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>定义并匹配的数据成员的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines and matches the depth only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象定义并匹配仅的深度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象，用于定义深度和数据成员都不。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: (This type of menu item binding is applied to all menu items in the menu.) 5.
trans-unit.target: （此类型的菜单项绑定适用于菜单中的所有菜单项。） 5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object that does not have a match in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>数据源中没有匹配项的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the value returned by the `ToString()` method of the data item is then bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties of the menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项方法然后绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性对其的菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data member to bind to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的菜单项的数据成员。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the menu depth to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置到的菜单深度<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When creating a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object, you must specify the criteria for binding.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象，你必须指定用于绑定的条件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 该条件指示何时数据项应绑定到的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the Depth property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定深度属性中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，或两者都。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the Depth property to specify the menu depth at which to apply the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用深度属性来指定要应用的菜单深度<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> declaration binds the Name and ID fields of the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> properties, respectively, of all menu items with a depth of 0: ``` <asp:MenuItemBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ``` Sometimes you might need to create a menu item binding that specifies both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>声明将绑定到数据源的名称和 ID 字段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性，分别的深度为 0 的所有菜单项︰``` <asp:MenuItemBinding Depth="0" TextField="Name" ValueField="ID"> ```有时可能需要创建一个指定的深度和数据成员的菜单项绑定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>的声明显示了如何指定应用于相同的数据成员位于不同的菜单深度的菜单项绑定︰ `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="1" TextField="Title">` `<asp:MenuItemBinding DataMember="Item" Depth="2" TextField="ISBN">`深度和数据成员未定义菜单项绑定，如果菜单项绑定应用于菜单中的所有菜单项。 </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，返回的值`ToString()`数据项方法然后绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性对其的菜单项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.target: 到的菜单深度<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied is enabled, allowing the item to display a pop-out image and any child menu items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否菜单项，则为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用对象被启用，允许该项以显示弹出图像和任何子菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Use the Enabled property to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 Enabled 属性设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This setting is shared with all menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此设置会对其的所有菜单项与共享<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, the menu item is disabled and no pop-out image that indicates child items is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`false`，菜单项被禁用并且不指示子项目的弹出图像将显示。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `false` for a menu item essentially makes the menu item the end of that node, where no further levels are shown off of that node.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`false`的菜单项就是使该菜单项的末尾该节点，其中任何进一步的级别会显示从该节点中移出。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is applied is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果菜单项，则为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用已启用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到数据源中的字段的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled*>属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref>对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the EnabledField property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用 EnabledField 属性指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the enabling of an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以重写各个菜单项启用通过设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，或两者都。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Enabled%2A> and EnabledField properties are both set, the EnabledField property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Enabled%2A>和 EnabledField 属性都设置、 EnabledField 属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled*> of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled*>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref>到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定的文本的菜单项的显示格式的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: The FormatString property is used to provide a custom format for a menu item's text.
trans-unit.target: FormatString 属性用于为菜单项的文本提供自定义格式。

trans-unit.source: The format string can consist of a literal string, a placeholder, or both.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串可以包含文本字符串、 一个占位符，或两者。

trans-unit.source: The literal string is displayed verbatim, while the placeholder is replaced with the value that is bound to the menu item's text.
trans-unit.target: 占位符替换为用于绑定到的菜单项文本的值时，将按原义，显示的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The placeholder is split into two parts, separated by a colon, in the form {`A`:`Bxx`}.
trans-unit.target: 占位符拆分为两个部分，在窗体中，以冒号分隔 {`A`:`Bxx`}。

trans-unit.source: For example, {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 例如，{0: f2} 显示一个带两位小数定点数。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The placeholder string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a placeholder and not a literal string.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 占位符字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个占位符，而不是文本字符串中。

trans-unit.source: Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。

trans-unit.source: Keeping to the standard formatting string syntax, the value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 标准格式字符串语法，冒号前的值将保持 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。

trans-unit.source: Because only one value can be displayed in each menu item, the parameter index can be set only to 0.
trans-unit.target: 因为可以在每个菜单项中显示只有一个值，则参数索引可以设置只为 0。

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the display format for the value.
trans-unit.target: 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定值的显示格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了常见的格式。

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > The format characters are not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified.
trans-unit.target: |格式字符 |说明 | |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。 | |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。 | |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。 | |`F`|固定格式显示数字值。 | |`G`|常规格式显示数字值。 | |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。 | |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 的格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the text of a menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 指定的文本的菜单项的显示格式的格式化字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本的菜单项的旁边显示的图像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageUrl property to specify the URL of a custom image to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源、 ImageUrl 属性用于指定要绑定到自定义图像的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: This image is shared with all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> objects to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 与所有共享此映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象向其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: 图像将显示菜单项的文本的旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的图像其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to display the same image in each menu item, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field of a data source.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性来显示每个菜单项中的同一个映像，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>到数据源的字段的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the ImageUrl and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果 ImageUrl 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrlField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image that is displayed next to the text of a menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 对文本的菜单项的旁边显示的图像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>应用。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到数据源中的字段的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl*>属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref>对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the ImageUrlField property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用 ImageUrlField 属性指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed next to a menu item's text and can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client's browser supports that format.
trans-unit.target: 图像将显示菜单项的文本的旁边，并且可以是任何文件格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等），只要客户端的浏览器支持该格式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the image for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以通过设置重写各个菜单项的图像其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，或两者都。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象移到一个字段，你可以还将其绑定到静态值通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display the same image in each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 这使你可以向其每个菜单项中显示相同映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A> and ImageUrlField properties are both set, the ImageUrlField property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A>和 ImageUrlField 属性都设置、 ImageUrlField 属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl*> of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl*>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref>到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ImageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to link to when a menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要链接到的菜单项时的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"> </xref>应用对象时发生。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the NavigateUrl property to specify the URL to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源时，请使用 NavigateUrl 属性来指定要绑定到的 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: This URL is shared with all menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 与对其的所有菜单项共享此 URL<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the menu item, the user is taken to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击菜单项时，则用户将转到指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the URL for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以通过设置各个菜单项的 URL 重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to navigate to the same URL in each menu item, you can also bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field of a data source by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性来导航到每个菜单项中的同一个 URL，还可以绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>通过设置数据源的字段的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the NavigateUrl and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.NavigateUrlField%2A> property takes precedence.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the PopOutImageUrl property to specify the URL of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.PopOutImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.PopOutImageUrl%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.PopOutImageUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标窗口或框架，用于显示与菜单项的关联网页内容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用对象。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the Target property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用目标属性指定的窗口或框架中显示的 Web 内容时，链接到的菜单项单击该菜单项。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control for the menu items to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置此属性将替代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>对其的菜单项控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override this property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each menu item directly.
trans-unit.target: 你可以有选择地通过重写此属性设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=fullName>直接每个菜单项的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Target values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 目标值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），但下表中所示，以下划线开头某些特殊值除外范围的开头。

trans-unit.source: |Target value|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported.
trans-unit.target: |目标值 |说明 | |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|呈现在新窗口中没有框架的内容。 | |`_parent`|呈现的即时框架集父代中的内容。 | |`_search`|呈现搜索窗格中的内容。 | |`_self`|呈现具有焦点的框架中的内容。 | |`_top`|呈现没有框架的完整窗口中的内容。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 检查你的浏览器文档以确定如果`_search`值受到支持。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 和更高版本支持`_search`目标值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Target 属性呈现为`target`属性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`属性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object must be XHTML 1.1 compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置目标属性的呈现的输出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>对象必须是符合 XHTML 1.1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: For more information, refer to the topic [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅主题[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> 时创建可访问网页，强烈建议你避免使用的目标属性将另一个窗口作为目标。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: 目标窗口或框架，用于显示链接的网页内容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的框架的窗口。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to open a new window can make it difficult for users of assistive technology devices to use the page.

trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the Value and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A> properties are both set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果值和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>都设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.ValueField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Supplemental data about a menu item to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is applied; this data is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 补充数据有关菜单项，则为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用; 不显示此数据。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the field from the data source to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value*> property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> object to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到数据源中的字段的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value*>属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref>对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is bound to a data source, use the ValueField property to specify the name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控件绑定到数据源，请使用 ValueField 属性指定要绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: When rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied contains the corresponding value from the field.
trans-unit.target: 呈现时，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>到每个菜单项的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象包含的字段中的相应值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not displayed in a menu item and is used to store any additional data about a menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied, such as data used for handling postback events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不会显示在菜单项和用于存储有关的菜单项的任何其他数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象，如用于处理回发事件数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can override the value for an individual menu item by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以通过设置各个菜单项的值重写其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source contains multiple tables or attributes, you must first establish the binding criteria by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> property, or both.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源包含多个表或属性，您必须首先建立绑定条件设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A>属性，或两者都。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Depth%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using this property to bind the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object to a field, you can also bind it to a static value by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用此属性将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>对象移到一个字段，你可以还将其绑定到静态值通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to specify the same value for each menu item to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding> object is applied.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你指定的每个菜单项相同的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>应用对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A> and ValueField properties are both set, the ValueField property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A>和 ValueField 属性都设置、 ValueField 属性优先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的字段名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value*>的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem"></xref>到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemBinding"></xref>应用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置此属性。
